trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出是否已凍結此儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell is frozen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已凍結此儲存格，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Frozen%2A> property depends on the state of the cell's parent row and column.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Frozen%2A>屬性取決於儲存格的父資料列和資料行的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the `Frozen` property of either the row or column is set to `true`, the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Frozen%2A> property will also be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Frozen`資料列或資料行的屬性設定為`true`，儲存格的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Frozen%2A>屬性也會`true`。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 含儲存格之資料列的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示儲存格位於所選儲存格所定義之區域的第一個資料行中，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示儲存格位於所選儲存格所定義之區域的最後一個資料行中，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示儲存格位於所選儲存格所定義之區域的第一個資料列中，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示儲存格位於所選儲存格所定義之區域的最後一個資料列中，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current format string of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的目前格式字串。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取儲存格的已格式化的值，以複製到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the value of the cell to copy to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示要複製到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" /> 之儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve a Clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來擷取剪貼簿格式的值，表示儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: The cell value is first retrieved in its display format from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的值第一次擷取顯示格式從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This may raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to format the value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType> event if formatting is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType>來格式化值的事件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果格式設定不成功的事件。

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的位置相關參數指出此儲存格中表示的區域中選取的資料格所定義之資料的資料表中的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, additional formatting information may be returned by this method along with the display-formatted cell value.
trans-unit.target: 根據儲存格的位置，額外的資訊可能會傳回這個方法，以及顯示格式化儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，資料列的第一個資料行中的資料格的 HTML 格式將會包含表示資料列開頭的標記。

trans-unit.source: The supported Clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 支援剪貼簿格式包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> 類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於 0 或是大於或等於控制項中的資料列數。

trans-unit.source: The value of the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> 屬性值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> 小於 0，表示儲存格是資料列行首儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control or the handler set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 格式化失敗，而且 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件沒有處理常式，或是該處理常式將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換成 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> 類型。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide customized Clipboard values.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法以提供自訂剪貼簿的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could override this method to support copying values from custom cell types.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以覆寫這個方法，以支援從自訂儲存格類型複製值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area.
trans-unit.target: 傳回圍住儲存格之內容區域的週框 (Bounding Rectangle)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area using a default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> and cell style currently in effect for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 和目前儲存格中所採用的儲存格樣式，傳回圍住儲存格內容區域的周框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: 圍住儲存格內容的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The size of the cell's contents is computed dynamically when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法時，會動態計算的儲存格內容的大小。

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation always returns <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別實作一律會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於 0 或大於控制項中資料列數減 1。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> 小於 0，表示儲存格是資料列行首儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的圖形內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到儲存格的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: 傳回圍住儲存格內容區域的周框，此內容區域是使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 和儲存格樣式所計算。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: 圍住儲存格內容的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The size of the cell's contents is computed dynamically when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法時，會動態計算的儲存格內容的大小。

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation always returns <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別實作一律會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property is read.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在內部呼叫時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>屬性唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> values that specifies the data error context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> 值的位元組合，指定資料錯誤內容。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current, formatted value of the cell, regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode and the value has not been committed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前已格式化的儲存格值，不管儲存格是否處於編輯模式，而值是否尚未認可。

trans-unit.source: The current, formatted value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 目前的已格式化值。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the current value of the editing cell or editing control if the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回編輯儲存格的目前值，或編輯控制項，如果儲存格處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method converts the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法會將儲存格的值轉換為相等的顯示值所表示的型別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: 這會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件，您可以處理以自訂值的轉換。

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式設定不成功，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有處理常式集合或這個事件沒有處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes that override this method will typically return a string representation of the cell value if the `context` argument includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.ClipboardContent> value.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別覆寫這個方法通常會傳回儲存格的值的字串表示，如果`context`引數包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.ClipboardContent>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於 0 或大於控制項中資料列數減 1。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> 小於 0，表示儲存格是資料列行首儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control or the handler set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 格式化失敗，而且 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件沒有處理常式，或是該處理常式將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換成 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> 類型。

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的圖形內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到儲存格的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回圍住儲存格的錯誤圖示之週框 (如果有此圖示)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 圍住儲存格的錯誤圖示之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> (如果有此圖示)，否則為 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The size of the cell's error icon area is computed dynamically when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法時，會動態計算儲存格的錯誤圖示區的大小。

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation always returns <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別實作一律會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorIconBounds%2A> property is read.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在內部呼叫時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorIconBounds%2A>屬性唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the error for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示儲存格錯誤的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the error for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 描述目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 錯誤的字串。

trans-unit.source: The value to be formatted.
trans-unit.target: 要格式化的值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> in effect for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 對儲存格有作用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> associated with the value type that provides custom conversion to the formatted value type, or <see langword="null" /> if no such custom conversion is needed.
trans-unit.target: 與實值型別相關的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" />，此實值型別可提供轉換為格式化實值型別的自訂轉換作業，如果不需要這種自訂轉換，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> associated with the formatted value type that provides custom conversion from the value type, or <see langword="null" /> if no such custom conversion is needed.
trans-unit.target: 與格式化實值型別相關的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" />，此格式化實值型別可提供從實值型別轉換的自訂轉換作業，如果不需要這種自訂轉換，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> values describing the context in which the formatted value is needed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> 值的位元 (Bitwise) 組合，其描述需要此格式化值的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell as formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格的格式化值，以供顯示。

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the cell or <see langword="null" /> if the cell does not belong to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格不屬於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項，則為儲存格的已格式化值或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會呼叫此方法，將資料格的值轉換為對等的顯示值所表示的型別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 控制項將資料格的值傳遞至這個方法在`value`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: A handler for this event can modify both the `value` and `cellStyle` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件處理常式可以修改同時`value`和`cellStyle`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定此處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`，不過，這個方法會格式化`value`使用的格式屬性`cellStyle`物件。

trans-unit.source: This method does not convert `value` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value for values equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType> or `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會轉換`value`至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性值的值等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性值時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>以外設定為值<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>或`null`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件 以顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的程式碼範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式設定不成功，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有處理常式集合或這個事件沒有處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes that override this method will typically return a string representation of the cell value if the `context` argument includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.ClipboardContent> value.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別覆寫這個方法通常會傳回儲存格的值的字串表示，如果`context`引數包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.ClipboardContent>值。

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control or the handler set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 格式化失敗，而且 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件沒有處理常式，或是該處理常式將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換成 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> 類型。

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property automatically instantiates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> if the property has not previously been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>屬性自動產生新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>如果先前尚未存取屬性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.HasStyle%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property is currently set to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> instance.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.HasStyle%2A>屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is useful to determine which properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property represent styles set specifically for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 這可用來判斷哪一個物件的屬性所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性表示特別針對資料格的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.

trans-unit.source: The styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property override the styles specified through all other cell-style properties, but do not necessarily indicate all the styles that contribute to the cell's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 透過指定的樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>屬性覆寫所有其他的儲存格樣式屬性，透過指定的樣式，但不是一定表示儲存格的外觀參與的所有樣式。

trans-unit.target: 初始化用來編輯儲存格的控制項。

trans-unit.source: As an optimization technique, typically all the cells of the same type and in the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> share a single hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 做為最佳化技巧，通常所有儲存格相同類型，而且在同一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>共用單一裝載編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: However, before the control is used by a cell, it needs to be initialized by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，使用的儲存格控制項之前，它需要由初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The first time it is called, this method adds the control to the list of editing controls in its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫時，這個方法就會將控制項加入至清單編輯控制項在其父代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: It also initializes some of the visual properties of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 它也會初始化某些資料格的視覺屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A> sets the background color of the editing area to match the supplied cell style parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A>設定編輯以符合提供的儲存格樣式參數區域的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A> do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 後續呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A>不執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes use this method to host an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class corresponding to their type.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別會使用這個方法來裝載的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>對應到其類型的類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, a table that contains one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> objects calls this method to add a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> editing control to the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，資料表包含一個或多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>物件呼叫此方法來加入單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>編輯控制項的擁有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A> method in a simple class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A>方法在簡單的類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 儲存格的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。

trans-unit.source: There is no associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> or if one is present, it does not have an associated editing control.
trans-unit.target: 沒有相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />，或者如果有一個相關聯的檢視表，它並沒有相關聯的編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this cell is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出目前是否正在編輯這個儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell is in edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格處於編輯模式中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when you are working directly with cell instances.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用直接與資料格執行個體，這個屬性是很有用。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to determine when the user enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件，以判斷使用者時進入編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列是共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row is unshared if the user presses a key while the focus is on the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指出當焦點在儲存格上，而使用者按下按鍵時，是否取消共用父資料列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果會取消共用資料列則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> class always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 基底 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 類別永遠會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.KeyDownUnsharesRow%2A> method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.KeyDownUnsharesRow%2A>方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 它必須傳回`true`如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>引數的效果的取消共用包含儲存格的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它應該傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> that represents the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" />，表示已按下的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Determines if edit mode should be started based on the given key.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否應該根據指定的按鍵啟動編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if edit mode should be started; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該要啟動編輯模式，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to create a custom cell that is editable.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫此方法以建立自訂的儲存格的編輯。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared if a key is pressed while a cell in the row has focus.
trans-unit.target: 指出如果當焦點在資料列中的儲存格時按下按鍵，是否會取消資料列的共用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果會取消共用資料列則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> class always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 基底 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 類別永遠會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.KeyPressUnsharesRow%2A> method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.KeyPressUnsharesRow%2A>方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, it must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中，它必須傳回`true`如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>作用就是取消共用包含儲存格的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它應該傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.target: 它必須傳回`true`如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyUp%2A>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>引數的效果的取消共用包含儲存格的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a user action moved focus to the cell; <see langword="false" /> if a programmatic operation moved focus to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者動作將焦點移動至儲存格則為 <see langword="true" />，如果程式設計作業將焦點移動至儲存格則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the focus leaves a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: 指出當焦點移出資料列中的儲存格時，是否取消共用該資料列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果會取消共用資料列則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared if the user clicks a mouse button while the pointer is on a cell in the row.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它應該傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> for the cell value type, or <see langword="null" /> to use the default converter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> 表示儲存格值的型別，<see langword="null" /> 則表示使用預設轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Converts a value formatted for display to an actual cell value.
trans-unit.target: 將為了顯示而格式化的值轉換成實際的儲存格值。

trans-unit.source: The cell value.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格值。

trans-unit.source: When the user edits a cell value and commits the change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert the displayed value from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者編輯儲存格的值，並認可變更，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會呼叫此方法，將轉換從顯示的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The control then sets the underlying cell value or data source value to the converted value.
trans-unit.target: 控制項接著設基礎資料格的值或資料來源值轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the `formattedValue` parameter using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style indicated by the `cellStyle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的預設實作會剖析`formattedValue`參數使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>所指示的儲存格樣式屬性`cellStyle`參數。

trans-unit.source: If `formattedValue` is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, this method returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property or `null` if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formattedValue`等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>，這個方法傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>屬性或`null`如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>是<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>和儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>是參考型別。

trans-unit.source: If `formattedValue` is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, this method parses `formattedValue` using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the specified or default converters.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formattedValue`不等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>，這個方法會剖析`formattedValue`使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>屬性和指定或預設轉換子。

trans-unit.source: If the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is nullable, this method wraps the return value as a <xref:System.Nullable%601> type.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>是可為 null，這個方法會包裝傳回的值做為<xref:System.Nullable%601>型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cellStyle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cellStyle" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType" /> property value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType" /> 屬性值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType" /> property value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType" /> 屬性值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="formattedValue" /> cannot be converted.
trans-unit.target: 無法轉換 <paramref name="formattedValue" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="formattedValue" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="formattedValue" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The type of <paramref name="formattedValue" /> does not match the type indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="formattedValue" /> 的型別不符合 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType" /> 屬性所指的型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have the control placed as specified by the other arguments; <see langword="false" /> to allow the control to place itself.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示讓控制項依其他引數所指定放置；<see langword="false" /> 則表示允許控制項本身自行放置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the size; <see langword="false" /> to allow the control to size itself.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示指定大小；<see langword="false" /> 則表示允許控制項本身自行調整大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the cell bounds.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，定義儲存格界限。

trans-unit.source: The area that will be used to paint the editing control.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製編輯控制項的區域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that represents the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />，表示正在編輯之儲存格的樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將垂直框線加入至儲存格，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將水平框線加入至儲存格，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the hosting cell is in the first visible column; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果裝載儲存格是在第一個可見的資料行中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the hosting cell is in the first visible row; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果裝載儲存格是在第一個可見的資料列中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the location and size of the editing control hosted by a cell in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中的儲存格裝載之編輯控制項的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: Some classes derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>, host a control in the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 某些類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>類別，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>，主控制項中選取的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.PositionEditingControl%2A> method positions the editing control inside of the host cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.PositionEditingControl%2A>方法將編輯控制項放置在主機資料格內部。

trans-unit.source: Because the editing control may take up more space than a single cell, it may need to be positioned differently when editing a cell in the first visible column or first visible row so it does not paint outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 因為編輯控制項可能需要更多的空間比單一資料格，可能需要編輯第一個可見資料列的第一個可見資料行中的資料格，因此它不會外繪製時以不同的方式放置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The cell is not contained within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格不包含於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項之中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the cell bounds.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，定義儲存格界限。

trans-unit.source: The area that will be used to paint the editing panel.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製編輯面板的區域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that represents the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />，表示正在編輯之儲存格的樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將垂直框線加入至儲存格，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將水平框線加入至儲存格，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell is in the first column currently displayed in the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格是在目前顯示於控制項中的第一個資料行中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell is in the first row currently displayed in the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格是在目前顯示於控制項中的第一個資料列中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the location and size of the editing panel hosted by the cell, and returns the normal bounds of the editing control within the editing panel.
trans-unit.target: 設定由儲存格裝載之編輯面板的位置和大小，並傳回編輯面板中編輯控制項的標準界限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the normal bounds of the editing control within the editing panel.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示編輯面板中編輯控制項的標準界限。

trans-unit.source: The cell has not been added to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格未加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in pixels, of a rectangular area into which the cell can fit.
trans-unit.target: 取得能夠容納儲存格的矩形區域大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> containing the height and width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，包含高度和寬度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.PreferredSize%2A> property returns the natural size of the cell computed by the cell's owning row and column.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.PreferredSize%2A>屬性會傳回自然大小的儲存格所計算的資料格的擁有資料列和資料行。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.PreferredSize%2A> returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a width and height of -1 if the cell is not contained in a table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.PreferredSize%2A> 傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Size>寬度和高度為-1，如果資料格不包含資料表中。

trans-unit.source: If the cell is in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> property set to `false`, -1 is returned for the width.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格位於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>屬性設定為`false`，寬度則傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: This method relies on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會依賴<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> 小於 0，表示儲存格是資料列行首儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列是共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格是資料行行首儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell's data can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以編輯儲存格的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell's data cannot be edited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格的資料無法編輯，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A> property indicates whether the data displayed by the cell can be edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A>屬性會指出是否可編輯儲存格所顯示的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A> for individual cells, or you can make an entire row or column of cells read-only by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A>的個別資料格，或者您可以將整個資料列或資料行的資料格為唯讀藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, if a cell's parent row or column is set to read-only, the child cells will adopt the same value.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，如果儲存格的父資料列或資料行設為唯讀，則子資料格會採用相同的值。

trans-unit.source: You can override this default behavior by setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A> for individual cells.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定覆寫此預設行為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A>個別儲存格。

trans-unit.source: You can navigate to a read-only cell, and you can set a read-only cell to be the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以瀏覽至唯讀的資料格，並且可以設定為目前的儲存格的唯讀資料格。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A> only affects whether a cell is editable; it does not affect whether the user can delete rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A> 只會影響是否在資料格為可編輯;它不會影響是否使用者可以刪除資料列。

trans-unit.source: There is no owning row when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，沒有主控資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The owning row is shared when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，會共用主控資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出儲存格是否可以調整大小的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell can be resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以調整儲存格的大小，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Resizable%2A> property is set by the cell's parent row or column.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Resizable%2A>屬性設定的儲存格的父資料列或資料行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that contains the cell; -1 if there is no owning row.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格之資料列的索引，如果沒有主控資料列，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex%2A> property returns -1, the cell is either a column header, or the cell's row is shared.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex%2A>屬性會傳回-1，資料格，則任一資料行標頭，或共用儲存格的資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell has been selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已選取此儲存格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell has been selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已選取儲存格，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: There is no associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，沒有相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The owning row is shared when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，會共用主控資料列。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The cell value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的儲存格值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 設定儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value has been set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經設定這個值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於 0 或是大於或等於父 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的資料列數。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> set to the owning row's height and the owning column's width.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 設定為主控資料列的高度和主控資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.source: If the cell is not associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Size%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a width and height of -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格不是與相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Size%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Size>寬度和高度為-1。

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列是共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格是資料行行首儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The style associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 與儲存格關聯的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性，其他屬性的型別繼承樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property override the styles specified through all other cell-style properties, but do not necessarily indicate all the styles that contribute to the cell's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 透過指定的樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>屬性覆寫所有其他的儲存格樣式屬性，透過指定的樣式，但不是一定表示儲存格的外觀參與的所有樣式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property to get the background color of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>屬性來取得儲存格的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger code example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains supplemental data about the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，其中包含儲存格的相關補充資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data about the cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含有關儲存格的資料。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Any type derived from the <xref:System.Object> class can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: 衍生型別<xref:System.Object>類別可以指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Tag%2A> property is commonly used to store data that is closely associated with the value displayed by the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Tag%2A>屬性通常用來儲存資料之資料格所顯示的值有密切關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text associated with this cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與這個儲存格相關聯的工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 與這個儲存格相關聯的工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is displayed as the cell ToolTip when the mouse pointer is over the cell and the property value is not <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會顯示為工具提示的儲存格上，當滑鼠指標位於儲存格上的屬性值不<xref:System.String.Empty>。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is <xref:System.String.Empty>, the cell will display a ToolTip containing the value of the cell if the value is truncated in the cell display; otherwise, the cell will not display a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值為<xref:System.String.Empty>、 資料格會顯示包含儲存格的值，如果值是在儲存格顯示被截斷，否則的工具提示、 資料格不會顯示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: You can also prevent the display of a ToolTip by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以藉由設定防止的工具提示顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`，取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>屬性引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>控制項的事件並傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設為指定的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property returns the previously specified value or its default value of <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件沒有處理常式時，取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>屬性會傳回先前指定的值或其預設值<xref:System.String.Empty>。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件時，主要是使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響，設定儲存格時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>多個資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 變更這個屬性會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged>上擁有事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property within an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>內的事件處理常式屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分[如何： 加入 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的個別資料格的工具提示](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that describes the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回描述目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise noted, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToString%2A> method for all the various cell types will return a string of the form shown in the following code example:
trans-unit.target: 除非另有註明，否則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToString%2A>所有各種不同的儲存格類型的方法會傳回下列程式碼範例所示的格式字串：

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with this cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與這個儲存格相關聯的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data to be displayed by the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要由儲存格顯示的資料。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a different value to a cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當您將不同的值指派到的資料格，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，就會引發。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>屬性是資料格，所包含的實際資料物件，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>屬性是資料的格式化的表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>屬性分別對應至這些值的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property, the specified value is not automatically converted from a formatted, display value to an underlying cell value.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>屬性，指定的值不會自動從格式化轉換時，基礎資料格的值來顯示值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> in effect for the cell is ignored, so setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> does not result in a property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>作用中的資料格會被忽略，因此將設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>並不會導致屬性值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to update a cell's contents with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何更新儲存格的內容與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分[如何： 處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex" /> is outside the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex" /> 不在有效範圍內，亦即從 0 到控制項中資料列數減 1 的範圍。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> 小於 0，表示儲存格是資料列行首儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格中值的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the data type of the value in the cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示儲存格中值的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property for the cell has not been set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the owning column is used, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>尚未設定儲存格的屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用主控資料行的屬性時，如果存在的話。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>屬性是資料格，所包含的實際資料物件，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>屬性是資料的格式化的表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>屬性分別對應至這些值的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is in a row or column that has been hidden.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出儲存格是在已隱藏資料列或是資料行中的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格為可見的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether the cell is in a row or a column with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出資料格是否具有的資料行或資料列在其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: It does not indicate whether the cell has been scrolled off-screen.
trans-unit.target: 它不會指出是否已經出螢幕外捲動的資料格。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a cell is visible within the display area of the control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Displayed%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否在控制項的顯示區域內為可見儲存格，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Displayed%2A>屬性。
